alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 30 at 10:46AM CDT until June 06 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Wahpeton affecting Wilkin and Richland Counties. .With rainfall anticipated over the next 24 hours, river levels along the Red River are expected to rise. The Red River at Wahpeton will continue rising into Moderate flood stage through midweek before dropping back into Minor flood stage by the late week period. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Wahpeton. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, North Main Street and bridge closed (Breckenridge). * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 13.4 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
